类 TransactionSystemComponents.RoundedComboBox.RoundedComboBoxUI

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
javax.swing.plaf.ComboBoxUI
javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicComboBoxUI
View.Transaction.TransactionSystemComponents.RoundedComboBox.RoundedComboBoxUI
封闭类:
TransactionSystemComponents.RoundedComboBox<T>
private class TransactionSystemComponents.RoundedComboBox.RoundedComboBoxUI extends BasicComboBoxUI
A custom UI for the RoundedComboBox to handle the arrow button and popup appearance.

  • 嵌套类概要
